title: panDitAgram pavana
sahitya:
paNDitAgram pavana putram sundarAngam naumi nityam


anupallavi

  maNDita guNAbhirAmam vandanIya janArthiharam


caraNam    anjanAsutam shivam amita vaibhavam drukanjalA sITA mAtA shOka 
bhanjanam niranjanam panca bANakhEla rahitam tanjapurI nivAsinam 
brahmEndra pratiSTitham varam shrI rAmanAma rasikapriyam
